name: Shard (germanjazzguy)
description:
Prototype of a Metroidvania started for Metroidvania Month Jam 11.
Still in active development, so any feedback is appreciated.
For most of the time, I did not follow an actual plan in developing this game, I just kept adding stuff I wanted to try/thought would be cool.

Controls:

AD: move
Space: jump
Return (Enter): attack
R: restart
